CZMDynInterval.description: A single interval in a time-varying property

VALUE_TYPE.description: Value type determines stride through DATA

DATA.description: Interleaved [time, value(s), ...] â€” stride depends on VALUE_TYPE

SAMPLED.description: Sampled data (when property uses epoch + data array)

CZMCartographicDegrees.description: Cartographic position (longitude, latitude, height in radians/meters)

HEIGHT.description: Height in meters above WGS84 ellipsoid

CZMCartesian.description: Cartesian position (X, Y, Z in meters)

LINE_COUNT_X.description: Number of grid lines along X

LINE_COUNT_Y.description: Number of grid lines along Y

LINE_THICKNESS_X.description: Thickness of grid lines along X

LINE_THICKNESS_Y.description: Thickness of grid lines along Y

LINE_OFFSET_X.description: Offset of grid lines along X

LINE_OFFSET_Y.description: Offset of grid lines along Y

CZMMaterial.description: Surface material (used by polygon, ellipse, box, etc.)

POSITIONS_CARTOGRAPHIC_DEGREES.description: Positions as cartographic degrees [lon, lat, height, lon, lat, height, ...]

POSITIONS_CARTESIAN.description: Positions as Cartesian [X, Y, Z, X, Y, Z, ...]

POSITIONS_CARTOGRAPHIC_DEGREES.description: Positions as cartographic degrees [lon, lat, height, ...]

CLOSE_TOP.description: Whether to close the top of extruded polygon

CLOSE_BOTTOM.description: Whether to close the bottom of extruded polygon

POSITIONS_CARTOGRAPHIC_DEGREES.description: Positions as cartographic degrees [lon, lat, height, ...]

LEAD_TIME.description: Trail time in seconds (how far behind)

TRAIL_TIME.description: Lead time in seconds (how far ahead)

COORDINATES_WSEN_DEGREES.description: Coordinates [west, south, east, north] in degrees

CZMPacket.description: A CZML Packet describing an entity and its properties

POSITION_EPOCH.description: Time-tagged positions [time, lon, lat, height, time, lon, lat, height, ...]

ORIENTATION_ARRAY.description: Orientation sampled data [t, x, y, z, w, t, x, y, z, w, ...]

DYNAMIC_PROPERTIES.description: Generic bag for all time-dynamic (non-static) properties
